text: The Coca-Cola J-League MVP of the Month is an award sponsored by Coca-Cola (partner since 2009) and promoted by J-League to highlight the best player in J. League and J. League 2. In this award, for now, J3 League is not considered. In every first two-divisions match, there will be an MVP, as for one for each division in every month.
